title: How to develop concentration  focus khushu in prayer? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Ayaan from India. Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh. Assalamu Alaikum. So I have a question that whenever I start to pray I don't get enough concentration in my prayer so how can I develop Khushu and Khuzu in my prayer? This requires a whole lecture and on my YouTube channel if you write Khushu in Salat there are many many links that would help you In Sha Allah build your Khushu and your submissiveness to Allah Azza Wa Jal.
